meta_description: Hangzhou Karn New Building Materials Co., Ltd. provides high-quality wallpaper adhesive powder OEM/ODM services, including product development, custom manufacturing, and global logistics.

hero.title: OEM/ODM Manufacturing Services
hero.subtitle: We provide professional wallpaper adhesive powder customization services for global brands, from formula development and production to packaging design, meeting all your brand requirements.

services.title: Our OEM Services
services.subtitle: We offer comprehensive OEM/ODM services, from product development to global logistics, ensuring your products meet market demands.

development.title: Product Development
development.description: Our technical team can develop custom formulations based on your specific requirements, including eco-friendly formulas, high-strength options, and various types of wallpaper adhesives.

manufacturing.title: Custom Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Our modern production facilities can manufacture at scale according to your brand specifications, while ensuring product consistency and high quality.

logistics.title: Global Logistics
logistics.description: We provide complete logistics solutions, including warehousing, packaging, and international shipping, ensuring your products are delivered timely and safely worldwide.

process.title: OEM Collaboration Process
process.subtitle: Our OEM process is simple and efficient, ensuring perfect execution at every stage from concept to delivery of your branded products.

consultation.title: Requirements Consultation
consultation.description: Our sales and technical teams communicate deeply with you to understand your product requirements, target markets, and budget.

development.title: Product Development
development.description: Our R&D team develops custom formulations based on your needs and provides samples for testing and evaluation.

production.title: Mass Production
production.description: Once the product formula is confirmed, we begin mass production with strict quality control throughout the process.

delivery.title: Packaging & Logistics
delivery.description: We package according to your brand guidelines and deliver products to their destination through reliable logistics channels.

advantages.title: Why Choose Our OEM Services
advantages.subtitle: Hangzhou Karn New Building Materials Co., Ltd. has years of OEM/ODM manufacturing experience, providing quality wallpaper adhesive products for global brands.

facilities.title: Advanced Production Facilities
facilities.description: Our factory is equipped with the most advanced production equipment and automation systems, capable of efficiently producing wallpaper adhesive powder products in various specifications.

team.title: Professional R&D Team
team.description: Our R&D team consists of industry experts with extensive formula development experience, capable of meeting special requirements for different markets.

experience.title: Rich International Experience
experience.description: We have provided private label manufacturing services to brands in multiple countries worldwide, familiar with international market requirements and standards, ensuring your products meet global market demands.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your OEM Project?
cta.description: Contact our professional team to discuss your private label production needs. We will provide you with customized solutions and detailed quotations.
